nodes.bodyText: Let's be a bit more specific (no pun intended) with the package name, e.g. com.baeldung.jvmbitversion

Initializing a static variable in a @Before-annotated method is not considered a good practice because unit tests can be run in parallel. In this case, it's not a big deal since the class is immutable, but I'd suggest either changing the @before to @BeforeAll or simply making the jvmVersion variable an instance variable (not static).
Use the givenX_whenY_thenZ naming convention for the test methods (the givenX part is optional).
Change this package as well, so that it's the same as that of the main class.
let's remove the blank line before this closing brace as per guidelines
